welcome_message_body: Welcome to Holzwickede, Germany! Whether you are here to experience its charming small-town atmosphere or to discover its rich history and beautiful nature, we hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic re-connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights at Essen Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
